alert.note: Alert for Milwaukee (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 2:19PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Milwaukee County through 315 PM CDT... At 218 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Milwaukee, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Milwaukee, West Allis, Wauwatosa, Brookfield, Greenfield, South Milwaukee, Cudahy, Whitefish Bay, St. Francis, Fox Point, Elm Grove, West Milwaukee, Glendale, River Hills, Milwaukee Hoan Bridge, Shorewood, State Fair Park, Marquette University, UW- Milwaukee, and Mitchell Park Domes. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 between mile markers 304 and 310. Interstate 43 between mile markers 73 and 80. Interstate 41 between mile markers 40 and 45. Interstate 41/894 near mile marker 0. Interstate 43/94 between mile markers 311 and 316. Interstate 41/94 near mile marker 317. Interstate 794 between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
